statements: UPDATE drug_manufacturing_processes SET compliance_status = TRUE, last_update = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE process_id = 1;
UPDATE drug_manufacturing_processes SET manufacturing_date = '2022-09-15', compliance_status = FALSE WHERE process_name = 'Sterilization';
UPDATE drug_manufacturing_processes SET compliance_status = true, last_update = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE process_id = 1;
UPDATE drug_manufacturing_processes SET manufacturing_date = '2021-10-15', compliance_status = false WHERE process_name = 'Testing Process';
UPDATE drug_manufacturing_processes SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE process_id = 1;
UPDATE fda_regulations SET regulation_description = 'New regulation description', regulation_name = 'Updated Regulation' WHERE regulation_id = 2;
UPDATE drug_manufacturing_processes SET description = 'New description' WHERE process_id = 1;
UPDATE fda_regulations SET regulation_description = 'Updated regulation description' WHERE regulation_id = 3;
UPDATE manufacturing_sites SET site_name = 'Factory A', location = 'New York' WHERE site_id = 1;

UPDATE manufacturing_sites SET location = 'New York' WHERE site_id = 1;

UPDATE products SET manufacturing_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE product_id = 5;
UPDATE drug_manufacturing SET quantity = quantity + 10 WHERE process_id = 1001;
UPDATE storage SET expiration_date = '2023-12-31', quantity = quantity - 5 WHERE facility_id = 2002 AND drug_name = 'Acetaminophen';
UPDATE drug_manufacturing SET quantity = 100, production_line = 'Packaging Room' WHERE process_id = 12345;
UPDATE manufacturing_logs SET step_description = 'Testing and quality control' WHERE process_id = 67890 AND step_number = 2;
